2026-02-17.content: Workflows is available in the following additional [region](https://docs.cloud.google.com/workflows/docs/locations): `asia-southeast3` (Bangkok, Thailand).

summary.title: Workflows now in Asia Southeast 3
summary.summary: Workflows has expanded its reach and is now available in the asia-southeast3 region, located in Bangkok, Thailand. This new availability allows users in this region to leverage Workflows for their application orchestration needs.
